headline: Lockheed Martin (LMT): Examining Valuation After Autonomous Air Systems Alliance and Legal Scrutiny
summary: Lockheed Martin (LMT) just revealed a substantial new partnership with BAE Systems at the DSEI global defense conference, setting its Skunk Works division to co-develop modular, uncrewed autonomous air systems with BAE's FalconWorks. This collaboration targets game-changing capabilities for electronic warfare and rapid-force deployment, a bold signal that Lockheed Martin is serious about staying at the technological forefront. The timing is intriguing, since news of this innovation comes in...
